Let's Justify Letters

With text-align: justify, only the words are justified. This is normally the desired behaviour, but sometimes it is useful to justify the letters too.

The plugin works by wrapping each letter into a span, which can be justified by the containing element.

The effect is best for titles and short sentences. The plugin isn't as useful for long paragraphs, as text-align: justify will usually suffice, and the plugin wraps words without hyphenation.
<br /> and other block elements will also screw the effect up.
